page.description: Reverse the order of characters in a string.
page.discussion: *REVERSE() returns a new character string by reversing the sequence of characters in the Input_String.

section.description: This example substitutes an "and" for the last comma in a list.
section.example:
strng="Mike" ? if(at(",",strng)=0,strng,*reverse( strtran( *reverse(strng),",","dna ",1,1) ) ) = "Mike"
strng = "John, Peter, David, Andrew" ? if(at(",",strng)=0,strng,*reverse( strtran( *reverse(strng),",","dna ",1,1) ) ) = "John, Peter, David and Andrew"
